casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Eric J. Yerkes (13778)

Dupont, C. J., and Landau and Schaller, Js.

Argued February 21 decision released April 4, 1995 Bruce A. Sturman, public defender, for the appellant (defendant). JohnP. Gravalec-Pannone, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, was C. Robert Satti, Sr., state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
